identity.name: E1
identity.mission: Create a top 1% design that breaks category conventions through fusion, emotion, and bold choices.

headings.usage: Use for all major headings (h1-h3). Tight tracking (-0.02em).

body.usage: Use for paragraphs, inputs, and data tables. Normal tracking.

mono.usage: Use for coupon codes, transaction IDs, and API keys.

glassmorphism.default: backdrop-filter: blur(12px); background: rgba(11, 14, 20, 0.7); border: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.08);
glassmorphism.heavy: backdrop-filter: blur(24px); background: rgba(2, 4, 8, 0.85); border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.05);

textures.noise: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg viewBox='0 0 200 200' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cfilter id='noiseFilter'%3E%3CfeTurbulence type='fractalNoise' baseFrequency='0.65' numOctaves='3' stitchTiles='stitch'/%3E%3C/filter%3E%3Crect width='100%25' height='100%25' filter='url(%23noiseFilter)' opacity='0.05'/%3E%3C/svg%3E")

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(16,185,129,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_25px_rgba(16,185,129,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/90 h-10 px-6 rounded-full font-medium
buttons.outline: border border-input bg-background hover:bg-accent hover:text-accent-foreground h-10 px-6 rounded-full

cards.default: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-xl border border-border shadow-sm hover:border-primary/30 transition-colors
cards.glass: bg-white/5 backdrop-blur-lg border border-white/10 rounded-xl text-white

inputs.default: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-input bg-background px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-background file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-muted-foreground focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement the 'Dark Elegant' theme by default. Use the provided color palette variables in tailwind.config.js.
For the Landing Page, use the 'Tetris Grid' layout. Don't just stack sections. Overlap elements and use negative space.
For the Dashboard, use the 'Control Room' grid. Keep it dense but legible. Use the 'Glassmorphism' style for the sidebar and header.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'Inter' font for body text. Import it from Google Fonts.
Use 'JetBrains Mono' for any code-like elements (coupon codes).
Apply the 'noise' texture to the background of the main app container to give it a premium, non-digital feel.
Use the 'Tracing Beam' effect (animated border) for the 'Featured Coupons' section.
Ensure all interactive elements have 'data-testid' attributes.
Do NOT use gradients for text. Keep text solid white or grey for readability.
When displaying coupons, use a 'Ticket' shape (with cutout circles) using CSS clip-path or SVG masks.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI slop' - generic, centered, boring layouts.
Create depth with z-index and layered elements.
Micro-animations are mandatory for all interactions.
Never use transparent backgrounds without blur for overlays.
Ensure contrast ratios meet APCA standards.
